title: Not being able to connect to matches.
body:
Since the patch, I have not been able to accurately connect to league of legends games using m home internet. This has not been an issue with any other game and I fear that it will start to penalise me for having troubles connecting. Any help?

(Phone tethering works fine to connect to matches)

replies.body: Had this problem too, haven't been able to play at all :'( Hope they fix it soon it's extremely frustrating cos everything else seems to work find just can't actually connect to a game once one has been made etc.
